txt.en: 'We need your help [placeholder]. Reports have come in that the Orcs are poisoning the river to the south of Maurûsh, we need you to go and stop them before the tributary is defiled!'
You have successfully stopped the Orcs from poisoning the river! Return with the scout to Ashâmi with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to defend the river from the Orcs who intend to poison it.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel south of Maurûsh and prevent the Orcs from poisoning the river.'
'The river is safe for now. I do not doubt that the Orcs will try again as long as they remain in control of Maurûsh.'
Your mission is to travel to the river near Maurûsh and stop the Orcs there from poisoning the tributary.\n\nSpeak to Ashâmi to travel.
